chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
order: A -> A -> Prop
order_trans: forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c

Goal:
forall (a b : A) (l : list A), ordered (a :: l) -> In b l -> order a b

Premises:
Inductive ordered : list A -> Prop := ordered_nil : ordered [] | ordered_one : forall a : A, ordered [a] | ordered_cons : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> ordered (a :: b :: l) Arguments ordered _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cons _ _ _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type] ?B : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type] ?f : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [A : Type order : A -> A ->...-> order a c |- list ?A]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type] ?B : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Prop] ?B : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Prop] ?B : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Prop]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type] ?B : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type] ?B : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
[] : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
EnvRing.Pinj : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
EnvRing.PX : EnvRing.Pol ?C -> BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type]
ordered_cons : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> ordered (a :: b :: l)
ordered_inv_order : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), ordered (a :: b :: l) -> order a b
ordered_ind : forall P : list A -> Prop, P [] -> (forall a : A, P [a]) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> P (b :: l) -> P (a :: b :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ordered l -> P l
ordered_sind : forall P : list A -> SProp, P [] -> (forall a : A, P [a]) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> P (b :: l) -> P (a :: b :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ordered l -> P l
Inductive ordered : list A -> Prop := ordered_nil : ordered [] | ordered_one : forall a : A, ordered [a] | ordered_cons : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> ordered (a :: b :: l) Arguments ordered _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cons _ _ _%list_scope
in_inv : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \/ In b l
ordered_skip : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), ordered (a :: b :: l) -> ordered (a :: l)
in_cons : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l)
in_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (l : list A), In b (map f l) -> exists a : A, In a l /\ b = f a
in_flat_map_ex : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C), In a (flat_map f l) -> exists b : B, In b l /\ In a (f b)
ZMicromega.in_bdepth : forall (l : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof) (a b : ZMicromega.ZWitness) (y : ZMicromega.ZArithProof), In y l -> ltof ZMicromega.ZArithProof ZMicromega.bdepth y (ZMicromega.EnumProof a b l)
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
fold_left_eta : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l : list B) (a : A) (f1 : A -> B -> A), (forall (a0 : A) (b : B), In b l -> f a0 b = f1 a0 b) -> fold_left f l a = fold_left f1 l a
in_flat_map_in : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C) (b : B), In a (f b) -> In b l -> In a (flat_map f l)
Bool.orb_prop : forall a b : bool, (a || b)%bool = true -> a = true \/ b = true
andb_prop : forall a b : bool, (a && b)%bool = true -> a = true /\ b = true
